definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
lit. lotus roots may break, but the fiber remains joined (idiom); lovers part, but still long for one another

sentences.english: Here in Shanghai, lotus roots are virtually precious delicacies.
sentences.chinese: 在這裏，藕這東西幾乎是珍品了。

sentences.english: Teng White Lotus Lake, also known as " merciless lotus root", characterized by lotus root is not even broken wire.
sentences.chinese: 白滕湖蓮藕又稱“無情藕”，其特點在於藕斷絲不連。

sentences.english: The roots, perhaps a metre or two long, lie deep in the thick, gluey mud of the lake bed.
sentences.chinese: 藕大概有一兩米長，深深地長在湖底厚厚的泥中。

sentences.english: Daylily lotus soup, tender crisp scent, cools the blood detoxification.
sentences.chinese: 藕拌黃花菜，清香嫩脆，涼血解毒。

sentences.english: This paper present non-modularized structure of tight coupling mode workflow control in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了非模板化的緊藕合式工作流控制方式。

sentences.english: Effect of mineral nutrition on development of stiff lotus( Nelumbo nucifera Gaertn. )were studied.
sentences.chinese: 分析了僵藕發生與礦質營養的關係。

sentences.english: Can you smell smell smell lotus seed, soil buried sweet lotus.
sentences.chinese: 你能聞到蓮子氣息，聞到泥土裏埋着的甜藕。

definition: Manchurian wild rice 菰[gu1], aka water bamboo, or its edible stem, which resembles a bamboo shoot
Chinese water chestnut/Eleocharis dulcis or E. congesta
winter bamboo shoots (smaller and tenderer as a result of being dug out before they come out of the soil)
radish (Raphanus sativus), esp. white radish 白蘿蔔|白萝卜[bai2 luo2 bo5]/CL:條|条[tiao2]
Gorgon fruit/Semen euryales (botany)/see also 芡實|芡实[qian4 shi2]
